price: 16. Ne le[588] tourne pas (plusieurs fois) dans ta langue, pressé que tu es de le retenir.
arabic: لَا تُحَرِّكۡ بِهِۦ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعۡجَلَ بِهِۦٓ
footnotes: [588] Le Coran. La parole est ici adressée à Muhammad (paix et bénédiction d’Allah sur lui).

version.title: French Translation - Noor International Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into French, by Dr. Nabil Radwan, published by Noor International Center - was printed in 2017.

meta.transliteration: lā tuḥarrik bihi lisānaka litaʿjala bihi
